title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: Shirley Snyder 10 yrs.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Repeated 1/4 off-set horizontally: 2 people sitting by water with house, boats, and sun in background in red, blue, yellow, green, purple, and black. Silk screened in three colors: red, blue, and yellow. Yellow over blue for green, and red over blue for purple.
